result.longName: Katmerciler Arac Üstü Ekipman Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

assetProfile.address1: Sokak No:10 A. O. S. B.
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Katmerciler Arac Üstü Ekipman Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells various vehicles in Turkey. It offers hydraulic ladder fire trucks, aerial ladder platforms, portable ladder fire trucks, narrow field fire trucks, rescue fire trucks, remote controlled foam tower, and rapid intervention vehicles; and garbage trucks and semi-trailers, skip loaders, mini tipper garbage vehicles, refuse container washing and disinfecting vehicles, combined canal suction and jetting vehicles, canal jetting and sewage vehicles, cesspit emptier and cesspit emptier trailers, road sweepers, and hook lifts. The company also provides water tankers and water tanker trailers, bulk trailers, fuel tankers and trailers, tippers and tipper trailers, low bed and cargo trailers, truck mounted ADR tankers, and ADR trailer tankers; heavy, medium, and light duty recovery trucks; articulated, telescopic, and sliding platforms; comfort, trend, and classic ambulances; mobile medical clinic trucks; mobile workshops and greasing trucks; cargo bodies with cranes; snow ploughs; and aircraft refuellers and furl hydrant dispensers. In addition, it offers armoured border security vehicles, personnel carriers, ambulances, command and patrol vehicles, backhoe loaders, VIP vehicles, ADR fuel tankers, water tankers, tippers, trailers, and telescopic forklifts, as well as tactical wheeled armoured vehicles, criminal investigation vehicles, riot control vehicles and shields, remote controlled armoured tracked excavators, light configurable utility vehicles, remote controlled armoured articulated wheel loaders, remote controlled armoured dozers, and remote controlled fire fighters. Further, the company provides cranes, silo trailers, and truck mixers; and after sale services. It also exports its products to approximately 60 countries. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Furkan  Katmerci
companyOfficers.title: Vice Chairman of the Exec. Board & Deputy CEO
